title: OK B(L)OOM(B)ER(G), Presideezy Yeezy 11.11.19
itunes:title: OK B(L)OOM(B)ER(G), Presideezy Yeezy 11.11.19
description:
In episode 513, Jack and Miles are joined by Alchemy This regular Joey Greer to discuss Kanye West for president, a new book by Anonymous about Trump, Bloomberg preparing to run for 2020 election, Coke entering the seltzer game, the Watchmen series, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. KANYE WEST I WON'T HAVE TO RUN FOR PREZ IN 2024 ... I'll Walk, with New Name!!!
  2. KANYE WEST
  3. Book by ‘Anonymous’ describes Trump as cruel, inept and a danger to the nation
  4. Bloomberg makes preparations for 2020 run
  5. Michael Bloomberg Actively Prepares to Enter 2020 Presidential Race
  6. Mike Bloomberg Should Go Away
  7. The e-scooter boom has caused at least 11 deaths since the beginning of 2018
  8. AHA to Bring More Fizz, Flavor and Fun to Coke’s Sparkling Water Portfolio
  9. 14 Big Questions From Watchmen’s Premiere Episode
  10. The Brave New World of HBO’s Watchmen
  11. The Right-Wing Troll Backlash Against HBO's Watchmen Is Hilariously Stupid
  12. Some Watchmen fans are mad that HBO’s version is political. But Watchmen has always been political.
  13. Like It or Not, Damon Lindelof Made His Own Watchmen And he’s pretty sure Alan Moore put a hex on him for doing it.
  14. WATCH: TNGHT - FIRST BODY

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
